testcase.classname: Registering a user in Para Bank
testcase.name: Registering a user for a Para Bank account - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Para Bank website......................................passed When User clicks the register link..........................................passed And User is redirected to the registration page.............................passed And User enters their first name"Jaikumar"..................................passed And User enters their last name"Buddi"......................................passed And User enters their address"Hyderabad"....................................passed And User enters their city"Hyderabad".......................................passed And User enters their state"Telangana"......................................passed And User enters their zipcode"500081".......................................passed And User enters their phone number"1234567890"..............................passed And User enters their ssn"123456789"........................................passed And User enters their username"Jai12345"....................................passed And User enters their password"Jaikumar123".................................passed And User confirms their password"Jaikumar123"...............................passed And User clicks the register button.........................................passed Then User is redirected to their profile....................................passed
